name: CMD Bird
description:
A bird you control through commands

This is a submission of the Mini Jam 99: Birds and the limitation was "Can't stop moving"

Comands

To control the bird you have to type the right command wich are:

"WALK" "JUMP" "DOWN"

if he hit something or the walk bar reaches  0 you lose

Programming and Design

Dagon

SFX and Music

limenpetra

Games made with LOVE

S2
